alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tippah, northwestern Prentiss and western Alcorn Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ripley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Ripley, Jumpertown, Hinkle, Theo, Falkner, Rienzi, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Murry, Allentown, Hightown, Collinstown, Biggersville, Crumtown, Gaston, Peoples, Tiplersville and Gift. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
